data.eml:eml: A new species of the sponge Raspailia (Raspaxilla) (Porifera: Demospongiae: Axinellida: Raspailiidae) from deep seamounts of the Western Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ekins, Merrick, Debitus, Cécile, Erpenbeck, Dirk, Hooper, John N. A. (2018): A new species of the sponge Raspailia (Raspaxilla) (Porifera: Demospongiae: Axinellida: Raspailiidae) from deep seamounts of the Western Pacific. Zootaxa 4410 (2): 379-386, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.2.7
